Nightshift bounds up into the shuttle and leaps into his seat.

" Ready, le=
t's do this.  Don't worry Lord Elder, I know we can pull it off, we've been=
 through worse."

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for =
things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.
=

On Nov 10, 2011, at 5:52 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrot=
e:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift grins casually with a thumbs up.
> >
> > "=
 You got it Lord Elder, this time I got feet ta land on instead of tires.
>=
 > And no more need'n spare tires either. No more flats, fender benders or
=
> > rollovers. From now on it's climbing, skulking and prowling for me. Of
=
> > course for the benefit of my comrades. And no more engines ta start up =
too.
> > Lov'n it, totally. "
> >
> > He saunters over to Wolfgang while ba=
ck in beast mode, tail hung high and
> > ears up and forward.
> >
> > " Oka=
y here's what I can do. Everything I hear will be transmitted back ta
> > y=
ou guys back in base. I call it reverse audio transmission, sorta like a
> =
> bug that's planted somewhere in spy missions but, mobile. I wont say a wo=
rd
> > but I will transmit in silent com. You'll get my messages via text. =
This
> > way those ugly mugs don't know what the slag they're in for. And l=
ittle old
> > me be'n as black as I am, will totally go unnoticed if I keep=
 ta dense
> > vegetation or deeply shadowed areas. Trust me, ain't no one g=
onna be look'n
> > real hard for someone who seems not ta be totally there.=
"
> >
> > He hands Lord Elder his transmit code.
> >
> > " If ya need ta ca=
ll me, use this number. Remember, text messages only."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> LORD=
 ELDER nodded, "Then may Primus be with you." He said as he stepped back.
>=
 
> "Alright soldiers." POLAR CLAW said in firm military tones. "Wheels up
=
> in 300 astro seconds, stow your gear and belt up, it's going to be
> cold=
 one."
> 
> PROWL, RAMULUS and WOLFGANG began hurrying towards the shuttle =
as
> POLAR CLAW paused to be sure that everyone was moving towards the
> sh=
uttle. The mission was a go.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift bounds up into the shuttle =
and leaps into his seat.</div><div><br></div><div>" Ready, let's do this. &=
nbsp;Don't worry Lord Elder, I know we can pull it off, we've been through =
worse."<br><br>Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for thi=
ngs you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends=
.</div><div><br>On Nov 10, 2011, at 5:52 AM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"=

p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Nightshift grins casually with a thumb=
s up.<br>
><br>
> " You got it Lord Elder, this time I got feet ta la=
nd on instead of tires.<br>
> And no more need'n spare tires either.  No=
 more flats, fender benders or<br>
> rollovers.  From now on it's climbi=
ng, skulking and prowling for me.  Of<br>
> course for the benefit of my=
 comrades.  And no more engines ta start up too.<br>
>  Lov'n it, totall=
y. "<br>
><br>
> He saunters over to Wolfgang while back in beast mod=
e, tail hung high and<br>
> ears up and forward.<br>
><br>
> " Oka=
y here's what I can do.  Everything I hear will be transmitted back ta<br>
=
> you guys back in base.  I call it reverse audio transmission, sorta li=
ke a<br>
> bug that's planted somewhere in spy missions but, mobile.  I =
wont say a word<br>
> but I will transmit in silent com.  You'll get my =
messages via text.  This<br>
> way those ugly mugs don't know what the s=
lag they're in for.  And little old<br>
> me be'n as black as I am, will=
 totally go unnoticed if I keep ta dense<br>
> vegetation or deeply shad=
owed areas.  Trust me, ain't no one gonna be look'n<br>
> real hard for =
someone who seems not ta be totally there."<br>
><br>
> He hands Lord=
 Elder his transmit code.<br>
><br>
> " If ya need ta call me, use th=
is number.  Remember, text messages only."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
LO=
RD ELDER nodded, "Then may Primus be with you." He said as he stepped back.=
<br>
<br>
"Alright soldiers." POLAR CLAW said in firm military tones. "Whee=
ls up<br>
in 300 astro seconds, stow your gear and belt up, it's going to b=
e<br>
cold one."<br>
<br>
PROWL, RAMULUS and WOLFGANG began hurrying toward=
s the shuttle as<br>
POLAR CLAW paused to be sure that everyone was moving =
towards the<br>
shuttle. The mission was a go.<br>
